restEndpoints.name: getSymbolsList
restEndpoints.description: Request via this endpoint to get a list of available currency pairs for trading. If you want to get the market information of the trading symbol, please use Get All Tickers.

properties.name: msg
properties.description: System error code description, provided in error response when code is not '0', see API

properties.name: data
properties.description: List of market information for each market symbol

properties.name: symbol
properties.description: unique code of a symbol, it would not change after renaming

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of trading pairs, it would change after renaming

properties.name: baseMinSize
properties.description: The minimum order quantity requried to place an order.

properties.name: quoteMinSize
properties.description: The minimum order funds required to place a market order.

properties.name: baseMaxSize
properties.description: The maximum order size required to place an order.

properties.name: quoteMaxSize
properties.description: The maximum order funds required to place a market order.

properties.name: baseIncrement
properties.description: The increment of the order size. The value shall be a positive multiple of the baseIncrement.

properties.name: quoteIncrement
properties.description: The increment of the funds required to place a market order. The value shall be a positive multiple of the quoteIncrement.

properties.name: priceIncrement
properties.description: The increment of the price required to place a limit order. The value shall be a positive multiple of the priceIncrement.

properties.name: minFunds
properties.description: The minimum spot and margin trading amounts

restEndpoints.name: getTicker
restEndpoints.description: Request via this endpoint to get Level 1 Market Data. The returned value includes the best bid price and size, the best ask price and size as well as the last traded price and the last traded size.

properties.name: msg
properties.description: System error code description, provided in error response when code is not '0', see API

properties.name: data
properties.description: List of market information for each market symbol

restEndpoints.name: getAllTickers
restEndpoints.description: Request market tickers for all the trading pairs in the market (including 24h volume). On the rare occasion that we will change the currency name, if you still want the changed symbol name, you can use the symbolName field instead of the symbol field via 'Get all tickers' endpoint.

properties.name: data
properties.description: List of market information for each market symbol

properties.name: ticker
properties.description: List of market information for each market symbol

properties.name: symbolName
properties.description: Name of trading pairs, it would change after renaming

properties.name: vol
properties.description: 24h volume, executed based on base currency

properties.name: averagePrice
properties.description: Average trading price in the last 24 hours

properties.name: available

properties.name: holds

restEndpoints.name: PlaceNewOrder
restEndpoints.description:
You can place two types of orders: limit and market. Orders can only be placed if your account has sufficient funds. Once an order is placed, your account funds will be put on hold for the duration of the order. How much and which funds are put on hold depends on the order type and parameters specified. See the Holds details below.
Placing an order will enable price protection. When the price of the limit order is outside the threshold range, the price protection mechanism will be triggered, causing the order to fail.
Please note that the system will frozen the fees from the orders that entered the order book in advance. Read List Fills to learn more.
Before placing an order, please read Get Symbol List to understand the requirements for the quantity parameters for each trading pair.

properties.name: clientOid
properties.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, e.g. UUID, with a maximum length of 128 bits.

properties.name: symbol
properties.description: A valid trading symbol code. e.g. ETH-BTC

properties.name: remark
properties.description: [Optional] remark for the order, length cannot exceed 100 utf8 characters

properties.name: stop
properties.description: Stop type, include entry and loss

properties.name: tradeType
properties.description: [Optional] The type of trading : TRADE （Spot Trade）, MARGIN_TRADE (Margin Trade). Default is TRADE. Note: To improve the system performance and to accelerate order placing and processing, KuCoin has added a new interface for order placing of margin. For traders still using the current interface, please move to the new one as soon as possible. The current one will no longer accept margin orders by May 1st, 2021 (UTC). At the time, KuCoin will notify users via the announcement, please pay attention to it.

properties.name: size
properties.description:
• For LIMIT orders: price per base currency
  • For MARKET orders:[Optional should be provided unless funds parameter is] Desired amount in base currency

properties.name: timeInForce
properties.description:
LIMIT order parameter
[Optional] GTC, GTT, IOC, or FOK (default is GTC), read Time In Force.

properties.name: cancelAfter
properties.description:
LIMIT order parameter
[Optional] cancel after n seconds, requires timeInForce to be GTT.

properties.name: postOnly
properties.description:
LIMIT order parameter
[Optional] Post only flag, invalid when timeInForce is IOC or FOK

properties.name: hidden
properties.description:
LIMIT order parameter
[Optional] Order will not be displayed in the order book

properties.name: iceberg
properties.description:
LIMIT order parameter
[Optional] Only a portion of the order is displayed in the order book

properties.name: visibleSize
properties.description:
LIMIT order parameter
[Optional] The maximum visible size of an iceberg order

properties.name: funds
properties.description:
MARKET order parameter
[Optional] The desired amount of quote currency to use

properties.name: msg
properties.description: System error code description, provided in error response when code is not '0', see API

restEndpoints.name: CancelOrder
restEndpoints.description:
Request via this endpoint to cancel a single order previously placed.

This interface is only for cancellation requests. The cancellation result needs to be obtained by querying the order status or subscribing to websocket. It is recommended that you DO NOT cancel the order until receiving the Open message, otherwise the order cannot be cancelled successfully.

request.name: orderId
request.description: Order ID, unique ID of the order.

properties.name: msg
properties.description: System error code description, provided in error response when code is not '0', see API

properties.name: cancelledOrderIds
properties.description: Unique ID of the cancelled order

restEndpoints.name: CancelSingleOrderByClientOid
restEndpoints.description: Request via this interface to cancel an order via the clientOid.

request.name: clientOid
request.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders.

properties.name: msg
properties.description: System error code description, provided in error response when code is not '0', see API

properties.name: clientOid
properties.description: Unique ID of the cancelled order

properties.name: symbol

properties.name: tradeType
properties.description: [Optional] the type of trading:TRADE (Spot Trading), MARGIN_TRADE (Cross Margin Trading), MARGIN_ISOLATED_TRADE(Isolated Margin Trading), and the default is TRADE to cancel the spot trading orders.

properties.name: msg
properties.description: System error code description, provided in error response when code is not '0', see API

properties.description: [Optional] Only list orders for a specific symbol.

properties.name: tradeType
properties.description: [Optional] the type of trading:TRADE (Spot Trading), MARGIN_TRADE (Cross Margin Trading), MARGIN_ISOLATED_TRADE(Isolated Margin Trading), and the default is TRADE to cancel the spot trading orders.

properties.description: System error code description, provided in error response when code is not '0', see API

properties.name: stop

properties.name: stopTriggered

properties.name: cancelAfter
properties.description: Cancel orders time，requires timeInForce to be GTT

properties.name: isActive
properties.description: Order status, true and false. If true, the order is active, if false, the order is filled or cancelled

websocketEndpoints.description: This topic will push all change events of your orders. Compared with v1, v2 adds an Order Status: "new", there is no difference in push speed.

properties.name: type

properties.name: size
properties.description: Provided only wheny message type is new

properties.name: filledSize

properties.description: Provided only when message type is match

properties.name: matchSize
properties.description: Provided only when message type is match

properties.name: tradeId
properties.description: Provided only wheny message type is match

properties.name: remainSize
properties.description: Provided only wheny message type is new, match, filled/i> or canceled

properties.name: canceledSize

properties.name: canceledFunds
properties.description: Market order accumulative cancellation funds. Provided only wheny message type is new, match, filled/i> or canceled

properties.name: originSize
properties.description: original quantity. Provided only wheny message type is new, match, filled/i> or canceled

properties.name: originFunds

Get account overview.
See API

properties.name: msg
properties.description: System error code description, provided in error response when code is not '0', see API

properties.name: data
properties.description: List of market information for each market symbol

properties.name: marginBalance
properties.description: Margin balance = positionMargin + orderMargin + frozenFunds + availableBalance - unrealisedPNL

restEndpoints.name: PlaceAnOrder
restEndpoints.description:
You can place two types of orders: limit and market. Orders can only be placed if your account has sufficient funds. Once an order is placed, your funds will be put on hold for the duration of the order. The amount of funds on hold depends on the order type and parameters specified.
Please be noted that the system would hold the fees from the orders entered the orderbook in advance. Read Get Fills to learn more.

properties.name: clientOid
properties.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, the maximum length cannot exceed 40, e.g. UUID, Only allows numbers, characters, underline(_), and separator(-)

properties.name: symbol
properties.description: a valid contract code. e.g. XBTUSDM

properties.name: remark
properties.description: [optional] remark for the order, length cannot exceed 100 utf8 characters

properties.name: stop
properties.description: [optional] Either down or up. Requires stopPrice and stopPriceType to be defined

properties.name: stopPriceType
properties.description: [optional] Either TP, IP or MP, Need to be defined if stop is specified.

properties.name: stopPrice
properties.description: [optional] Need to be defined if stop is specified.

properties.name: reduceOnly
properties.description: [optional] A mark to reduce the position size only. Set to false by default. Need to set the position size when reduceOnly is true.

properties.name: closeOrder
properties.description: [optional] A mark to close the position. Set to false by default. It will close all the positions when closeOrder is true.

properties.name: forceHold
properties.description: [optional] A mark to forcely hold the funds for an order, even though it's an order to reduce the position size. This helps the order stay on the order book and not get canceled when the position size changes. Set to false by default.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Order size (amount of contract to buy or sell). Must be a positive number.

properties.name: timeInForce
properties.description: limit order parameter. [optional] GTC, IOC(default is GTC), read Time In Force

properties.name: postOnly
properties.description: limit order parameter. [optional] Post only flag, invalid when timeInForce is IOC. When postOnly chose, not allowed choose hidden or iceberg.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: limit order parameter. [optional] Orders not displaying in order book. When hidden chose, not allowed choose postOnly.

properties.name: iceberg
properties.description: limit order parameter. [optional] Only visible portion of the order is displayed in the order book. When iceberg chose, not allowed choose postOnly.

properties.name: visibleSize
properties.description: limit order parameter. [optional] The maximum visible size of an iceberg order

properties.name: msg
properties.description: System error code description, provided in error response when code is not '0', see API

properties.name: data
properties.description: List of market information for each market symbol

restEndpoints.name: CancelAnOrder
restEndpoints.description:
Cancel an order (including a stop order).
You will receive success message once the system has received the cancellation request. The cancellation request will be processed by matching engine in sequence. To know if the request has been processed, you may check the order status or update message from the pushes.
The order id is the server-assigned order id, not the specified clientOid.
If the order can not be canceled (already filled or previously canceled, etc), then an error response will indicate the reason in the message field.

request.name: orderId
request.description: The order id is the server-assigned order id, not the specified clientOid.

properties.name: msg
properties.description: System error code description, provided in error response when code is not '0', see API

properties.name: data
properties.description: List of market information for each market symbol

restEndpoints.description: For private channels and messages (e.g. account balance notice), please make request as follows after authorization to obtain the server list and authorized token.

properties.name: msg
properties.description: System error code description, provided in error response when code is not '0', see API

properties.name: instanceServers
properties.description: List of market information for each market symbol

properties.name: endpoint
properties.description: Websocket server address for establishing connection

properties.name: encrypt
properties.description: Indicate whether SSL encryption is used

properties.name: pingInterval
properties.description: Recommended to send ping interval in millisecond

properties.name: pingTimeout
properties.description: Recommended to send ping interval in millisecond

properties.name: type
properties.description:
Type Descriptions:
  • open: when the order enters into the order book;
  • match: when the order has been executed;
  • filled: when the order has been executed and its status was changed into DONE;
  • canceled: when the order has been cancelled and its status was changed into DONE;
  • update: when the order has been updated;

properties.name: status
properties.description:
Order Status Descriptions
  • match: when taker order executes with orders in the order book, the taker order status is “match”;
  • open: the order is in the order book;
  • done: the order is fully executed successfully;

properties.name: canceledSize
properties.description: In the update message, the size of order reduced

properties.name: oldSize
properties.description: Size Before Update (when the type is update)

properties.name: liquidity
properties.description: Trading direction, buy or sell in taker

websocketEndpoints.name: StopOrderLifecycleEvent
websocketEndpoints.description:
Stop Order Lifecycle Event websocket stream.
See API

properties.name: status
properties.description:
Order Status Descriptions
  • match: when taker order executes with orders in the order book, the taker order status is “match”;
  • open: the order is in the order book;
  • done: the order is fully executed successfully;

properties.name: orderPrice
properties.description: Order price. For market orders, the value is null

properties.name: stopPriceType
properties.description: Trigger price type of stop orders

properties.name: triggerSuccess
properties.description: Mark to show whether the order is triggered. Only for triggered type of orders

properties.name: error
properties.description: Error code, which is used only when the trigger of the triggered type of orders fails

websocketEndpoints.name: AccountBalanceEvents
websocketEndpoints.description: Stop Order Lifecycle Event websocket stream.

properties.description: Provided when subject is orderMargin.change. Current order margin

properties.name: withdrawHold
properties.description: Provided when subject is withdrawHold.change. Current frozen amount for withdrawal

properties.name: availableBalance
properties.description: Provided when subject is availableBalance.change. Current available amount

properties.name: holdBalance
properties.description: Provided when subject is availableBalance.change. Current available amount

websocketEndpoints.name: PositionChangeEvents
websocketEndpoints.description: Stop Order Lifecycle Event websocket stream.

request.name: symbol
request.description: Symbol of the contract, ex:'XBTUSDTM'. Empty string to subscribe for all symbols.

properties.name: realisedGrossPnl
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Accumulated realised profit and loss

properties.name: symbol
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Symbol

properties.name: crossMode
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Cross mode or not

properties.name: liquidationPrice
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Liquidation price

properties.name: posLoss
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Manually added margin amount

properties.name: avgEntryPrice
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Average entry price

properties.name: unrealisedPnl
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change. Unrealised profit and loss

properties.name: markPrice
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change or position.settlement. Mark price

properties.name: posMargin
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Position margin

properties.name: autoDeposit
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Auto deposit margin or not

properties.name: riskLimit
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Risk limit

properties.name: unrealisedCost
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Unrealised value

properties.name: posComm
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Bankruptcy cost

properties.name: posMaint
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Maintenance margin

properties.name: posCost
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Position value

properties.name: maintMarginReq
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Maintenance margin rate

properties.name: bankruptPrice
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Bankruptcy price

properties.name: realisedCost
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Currently accumulated realised position value

properties.name: posInit
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Position margin

properties.name: realisedPnl
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Realised profit and losts

properties.name: realLeverage
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change. Leverage of the order

properties.name: changeReason
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. ChangeReason: marginChange, positionChange, liquidation, autoAppendMarginStatusChange, adl

properties.name: currentCost
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Current position value

properties.name: openingTimestamp
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Open time

properties.name: currentQty
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Current position

properties.name: delevPercentage
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change. ADL ranking percentile

properties.name: currentComm
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Current commission

properties.name: realisedGrossCost
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Accumulated reliased gross profit value

properties.name: isOpen
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Opened position or not

properties.name: posCross
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change and changeReason is position.change. Manually added margin

properties.name: unrealisedRoePcnt
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change. Rate of return on investment

properties.name: unrealisedPnlPcnt
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.change. Position profit and loss ratio

properties.name: settleCurrency
properties.description: Currency used to clear and settle the trades

properties.name: success
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.adjustRiskLimit. Successful or not

properties.name: riskLimitLevel
properties.description: Provided when subject is position.adjustRiskLimit. Current risk limit level
